thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Paralegal - Pro Sports

title: Paralegal - Pro Sports
text: The Paralegal supports the Deputy General Counsel and SVP & General Counsel in all legal matters, including preparing and reviewing key business agreements, transactions...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
